# ArgsReader.LongOptionIgnoreKebabCase property

True if long options (e.g. `--dry-run`) should ignore "kebab case", i.e. allow `--dryrun`. (Default false.)

```csharp
public bool LongOptionIgnoreKebabCase { get; set; }
```
